name: Little Idea
tag_list: invention-development, inventions, innovation, product-development, business-development, marketing, ecommerce, web-development, app-development, consulting, product-engineering, prototyping, online-marketing, business-evaluation
overview:
Little Idea is an invention development company facilitating every step of the invention development process for small businesses and individuals.

Businesses or individuals who need help at any step of the invention development process can find assistance in anything from obtaining a patent to marketing to transforming an intangible idea into a commercial product. Services offered include: market assessment and analysis, research and development, marketing strategies and proposals, general engineering, prototype/product design and development, manufacturing representation, patent/trademark searches and submissions, e-commerce set-up, tradeshow representation, social media marketing, website and mobile app development, promotional video production, and business evaluation and exit strategy assistance.

Clients and products include: the T4 utility cord tensioner, Leap of Faith Clothing with their CAPEtees, Klaspet with their reusable and decorative necklace clasp secures, Flexiruggz with their modular and washable rugs, and Food Notations with their reusable name plates for serving lines.

external_links.title: Lots of ideas lead Charlotte inventor to launch patent company
